Text: Tamer of Tigers (released in English as Tiger Girl, Russian: Укротительница тигров , "Ukrotitelnitsa tigrov " ) is a 1955 Soviet-era comedy film released by Lenfilm, directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova and Aleksandr Ivanovsky.
